quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: So at this point, it looks like they want it to collapse.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I can’t say that’s their intent, but I know that’s how it feels given the gaps.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Feels like? It’s obvious when the same mistakes keep happening.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I agree the repetition is unacceptable, and I’ve raised that.

quotes.speaker: Ben Carter
quotes.quote: Raised it isn’t the same as fixing it.

quotes.speaker: Emma Veritas
quotes.quote: I know, and I wish I could give you a clear resolution right now.

contradictions.issue: Victim asserts systemic failure intentional; advocate avoids intent but concedes repetition is unacceptable
